document_data.name: Arachnophobia
document_data.mainbody: '''''Arachnophobia''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[illusion]] [[spell]] that created a terrifying illusion of thousands of [[spider]]s.
document_data.Effects: The number of targets affected by this spell depended on the skill of the caster, but all needed to be within a sphere with a diameter of {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: ''Arachnophobia'' was a spell developed by the [[neogi]].{{Cite dragon/184/Magic With an Evil Bite|92-94}}
